parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the diameter of bounding sphere of the object of given classname in meters. Size returned is usually bigger than the biggest size of the object along any of the axes. For example if object is 10 x 4 x 5 the [[sizeOf]] value returned expected to be around 10. If you need to estimate the size of the object more precisely, use [[boundingBox]] or [[boundingBoxReal]].<br><br>

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> At least one object of the given classname has to be present in the current mission otherwise zero will be returned</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sizeOf''' classname

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> classname: [[String]] - object classname

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_dimension = [[sizeOf]] "M1Abrams"; //returns 10.7833</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[boundingBox]], [[boundingBoxReal]], [[boundingCenter]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
